componentDescription: A versatile button component for user interaction with various styles, sizes, and interactive effects.

children.description: Optional React node(s) to be displayed as the button's content.

to.description: Optional string for the navigation target URL, making the button act as a link.

isLoading.description: Optional boolean to indicate if the button is currently in a loading state.

loaderProps.description: Optional LoaderProps object to configure the appearance and behavior of the loader animation.

loaderPosition.description: Optional LoaderPosition to determine the location of the loader animation relative to the button content.

icon.description: Optional React node(s) defining the icon to be displayed within the button.

iconPosition.description: Optional IconPosition to specify the icon placement inside the button relative to text.

isDisabled.description: Optional boolean to indicate if the button is non-interactive/disabled.

isFilled.description: Optional boolean to control the fill property of the button, affecting its style.

isAuto.description: Optional boolean indicating if the button size should automatically adjust to its content.

isIconRounded.description: Optional boolean that adds a rounded style to the icon if present.

onClick.description: Optional function that will be called when the button is clicked.

size.description: Optional Size to specify the size of the button.

shadow.description: Optional shadow property that can be a predefined Shadow, Elevation value or custom CSSProperties to apply shadow effects to the button.

shape.description: Optional Shape to specify the shape of the button (e.g., rounded or square edges).

ariaLabel.description: Optional string used as an accessible label for screen readers.

variant.description: Variant to define the stylistic variation of the button.

color.description: Optional color scheme for the button.

borderMovingDuration.description: Duration in seconds for the border animation in the 'borderMoving' variant.

borderMovingGradientColors.description: Array of colors for the gradient in the 'borderMoving' variant's border animation.

animatedStrokeAccentColor.description: Accent color for the animated stroke effect in the 'animatedStroke' variant.

views.type: { container?: ViewProps; content?: ViewProps; loader?: ViewProps; icon?: ViewProps; link?: ViewProps; }
views.description: Optional ViewProps objects to customize the styling of internal sub-components like the container, content, loader, icon, or link.
